original: Dhammo mato ko nu taveva saṁsi;
analyzed: dhammaḥ mataḥ kaḥ nu tava iva sasi
dhammaḥ mataḥ na atthi mama ittha kaṅkhā
ye iye iva dāni pāpāḥ bhavanti
su nisā hi mayham vañjhā ahosi
jīvāmi vā ūham na mata ūham asmi
tava iva atthāya idha āgataḥ asmi
mama eva atthāya idha āgataḥ asi
aham ca putto suṇisā ca nattā
hatā api santā na jahāsi dhamma
tuvam ca puttaḥ suṇisā ca nattā
